National Sentence Text: The number of occupants permitted to enter a room shall not exceed the maximum occupant load calculated in conformance with Sentence 2.7.1.3.(1).
Matched National Sentence (Variation): The number of occupants permitted to enter a room shall not exceed the maximum occupant load calculated in conformance with Sentence (1).
P/T Sentence Text: The number of people occupying a room or floor area in an occupancy shall not exceed the occupant load for the intended use as determined in accordance with this Article.
